nodes.text: Mua Niab was a male Sullustan technician living during the Galactic War, who did not speak Galactic Basic Standard. In 3639 BBY he was called to repair a mobility-impaired droid AV-9R on the Carrick Station.

Mua Niab appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a companion of the Operation courier for the "Explosive Conflict" operation. Originally present on the Carrick Station, he was moved to Gav Daragon with Update 4.0.
